language.name: English
kernel.allrefresh.warning:
There is a bug where refreshing the resource pack while sound effects or music is playing causes the program to crash!
Are you sure you want to continue?
kernel.allrefresh.error: Unable to refresh resource pack while sound effect or music is playing!
options.theme.title: Theme
options.language.title: Language
options.language.language.info:
Change the overall language
(there may be errors)
options.sound.title: Sound
options.sound.audio_reset.info: Reset Unity Audio (Only use when sound is choppy)
options.video.title: Video
options.video.vSync.info:
Match the frame generation of the graphic card and the frame output timing of the monitor
(You can think of it as limiting the frame rate to the monitor's hertz.)
options.video.fixedGuiSizeEnable.info: Fix GUI size not proportional to resolution
options.statusbar.title: Status Bar
options.statusbar.bottomMode.info: Show the status bar at the bottom
options.statusbar.time.title: Time
options.statusbar.time.twentyFourHourSys: Change the time displayed in the status bar to 24-hour clock
options.statusbar.time.toggleSeconds.inf: Add seconds to the time displayed in the status bar
options.input.title: Input
options.input.highPrecisionMouse.info:
Ignore system mouse acceleration
Commonly called Raw Input on Windows
options.input.highPrecisionMouse.warning:
Ignoring system mouse acceleration is a very unstable setting
Would you still like to turn it on?<size=10>

</size><size=15>(It is recommended to set the Windows mouse sensitivity or hardware mouse sensitivity similar to the game settings)</size>
options.input.highPrecisionMouse.os_warn: Operating systems other than Windows are not supported
options.input.mouseSensitivity.info: Change the sensitivity of the mouse (if the Ignore system mouse acceleration setting is turned on, the sensitivity of the mouse pointer is also changed)
options.advanced.title: Advanced
options.advanced.allowProgressBarShow: Always show loading bar on splash screen
options.advanced.allowProgressBarShow.in: Always show the loading bar on the start screen (even if you turn it off, the loading bar will appear if it takes a long time to load)
options.debug.title: Debug
options.debug.textShow.info: Display text on the debug screen
options.debug.graphShow.info: Display the graph in the debug screen
options.debug.textRefreshDelay.info: Adjusts the delay at which text is refreshed
options.debug.graphRefreshDelay.info: Adjusts the delay at which the graph refreshes
options.debug.graphSpeed.info: Adjusts the speed of the graph
controls.video.title: Video
controls.side_bar.title: Side Bar
controls.notice_bar.title: Notice Bar
controls.volume_control.title: Volume Control

notice.running_task.drag_and_drop.resour: A resource pack with the same name already exists.
